version_description:
In this update:
- Market orders
- Track Bittrex credit balances
- Reduced login time
- Various bug fixes and improvements

In this release:
- Improved market orders
- Improved order books
- Fixed issues that occurred with some limit sell orders

In this release:
- Deposit and Withdraw available, on select coins
- Track your holdings total in BTC, ETH and USD
- Fixed issues with buy and sell limit and market orders
- Dust is now "small balances", visible or removable via a toggle button

In this release:
- Resolved calculation error, on orders utilizing the slider, from version 1.4.1

Previous release:
- Deposit and Withdraw available, on select coins
- Track your holdings total in BTC, ETH, USD and USDT
- Dust is now "small balances", visible or removable via a toggle button

In this release:
- Additional coins and tokens available for deposit and withdraw
- Various small improvements and bug fixes

In this release:
- Refer a Friend, share your code with friends and earn a 10% commission on every trade they make
- Fund your account with your Credit/Debit card, in select countries
- New order type available, Stop-Limit
- Deposit and Withdraw available on additional coins, DASH, HBAR, KMD, MER, WAXP and XTZ
- Deposits now have a QR available, on select coins

In this release:
- Deposit and Withdraw available on additional coins, EDR AND PIVX
- Resolved limit order bug
- Update account information, in app
- Users with Euro enabled accounts, can now view their holdings in Euros
- Users with Euro enabled accounts now have access to Euro markets

In this release:
- Deposit and Withdraw available on additional coins: CRO, HIVE, HBD, SXP, ELAMA, STC, XHV and REV
- Resolved log in bug, this caused users to be logged out repeatedly
- Resolved credit card bug, a set of users were receiving an error while attempting to fund accounts

In this release:
- New Users can now create a Bittrex account from the mobile app.
- Instantly purchase BTC, ETH, USDT and more with your credit/debit card, using wire transfers or with existing USD/EUR balances.
- Deposit and Withdraw available on additional coins, OXT, BOA, HXRO, ALGO, OGN, USDC, MDT.

In this release:
- New Users can now create a Bittrex account from the mobile app.
- Instantly purchase BTC, ETH, USDT and more with your credit/debit card, using wire transfers or with existing USD/EUR balances.
- Deposit and Withdraw available on additional coins, OXT, BOA, HXRO, ALGO, OGN, USDC, MDT.

In this release:
- Open order history now includes Trailing-Stop orders completed on the web or through the API.
- Pending crypto withdraw transactions completed on the app or web, can now be canceled in the app.
- Resolved missing account information bug for new user accounts. Users missing account information are now being prompted to input any missing required information for creating an account.
- Market details in certain markets were showing incorrect USD equivalent balances, this has been resolved.
- Deposit and Withdraw available on additional coins, UBT, CGLD, HNS

In this release:
- Fund your account with your Credit/Debit card, in select markets
- Instantly purchase select coins using your Debit card
- Resolved a bug with the quantity slider, some users were experiencing a bug that caused the slider to crash the app when adjusting the slider.

In this release:
- Brand asset updates
- Minor improvements

In this release:
- New users creating an account will have the option of seamlessly navigating into the "Instant" feature
- Deposit and Withdraw available on additional coins DEP, ENJ, VET, LOON, MET, WAVES, GAME, ARK, APM, LBC, BTT , and SC
- Improved the purchase details after an "Instant" transaction

In this release:
- Important system update
- Minor improvements

In this release:
- Important system updates

In this release:
- Updated new customer onboarding experience
- Improved credit card purchasing experience

In this release:

- Users can now place One Cancels the Other (OCO) orders on the mobile app
- While in the Instant tab, users can now learn more about coins in Instant
- Deposit and Withdraw available on additional coins: ME, UTI, ATOM, REP, LSK, CNTM, XUC, ORBS, VID, HEDG, SIX, MKR, BTU, ENG, DOT, XVG, ABBC, ZIL, CKB, STRAT, VLX, RLC, QNT, ARDR and XTP
- Improved experience for users withdrawing cryptocurrencies that require a memo

In this release:
- New users creating an account will have the option of seamlessly navigating into the "Instant" feature
- Deposit and Withdraw available on additional coins: VBK, TRAC, MOF, KDAG, CTC, BNT, UBQ, XZC, QTUM, UTK, FCT, EOS, CPC, ONT, SOLVE, RDD, OCEAN, MFT, SYS, LUNA, ZEN

In this release:
- New users creating an account will have the option of seamlessly navigating into the "Instant" feature
- Deposit and Withdraw available on additional coins: VBK, TRAC, MOF, KDAG, CTC, BNT, UBQ, XZC, QTUM, UTK, FCT, EOS, CPC, ONT, SOLVE, RDD, OCEAN, MFT, SYS, LUNA, ZEN

In this release:
- Users can now learn more about crypto currencies while in the "Instant" feature
- Fixed an issue where some users' orderbooks were updating slower than expected

In this release:
- Users can now access the app in Spanish, Portuguese, Vietnamese, Russian, Hindi, Turkish, Simplified Chinese, Korean, and Italian
- Users can now deposit and withdraw all cryptocurrencies available in their locale
- Fixed an issue where some users were seeing delays in order and holdings updates

In this release:
- Fixed a bug which prevented certain currencies from being displayed for Instant purchase

- When signing in with 2FA enabled, users will be presented with a link directly to their authenticator app
- Fixed a bug where some users would see chart time frame reset after 1 minute
